{CustomModelData:707100,Damage:0,HideFlags:127,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gold","text":"Item Ability:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"gold","text":"Pillager\'s Pride"},{"bold":true,"color":"yellow","text":" RIGHT CLICK"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"These effects are given to you for 15 seconds:"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Swiftness 2"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Glowing"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"After that, you gain these effects for 5 seconds:"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Slowness 2"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Resistance 3"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Darkness"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Weakness 1"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Cooldown:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"green","text":"45s"}],"text":""}','{"extra":[{"text":""}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"bold":true,"color":"green","text":"UTILITY ITEM"}],"text":""}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"green","text":"Pillager\'s Pride"}],"text":""}'}}

{CustomModelData:707100,Damage:0,HideFlags:127,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gold","text":"Item Ability:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"gold","text":"Second Wind"},{"bold":true,"color":"yellow","text":" RIGHT CLICK"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"Become unable to move manually for 3 seconds,"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"then gain these effects for 30 seconds:"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Swiftness 1"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Night Vision"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Cooldown:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"green","text":"60s"}],"text":""}','{"extra":[{"text":""}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"bold":true,"color":"green","text":"UTILITY ITEM"}],"text":""}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"green","text":"Second Wind"}],"text":""}'}}

{CustomModelData:707100,Damage:0,HideFlags:127,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gold","text":"Item Ability:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"gold","text":"Nothing Personal!"},{"bold":true,"color":"yellow","text":" RIGHT CLICK"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"Affects the closest player within a 12 block radius"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"with Darkness for 15 seconds and plays a sound."}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"After 5 seconds of Darkness, you teleport behind"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"the player."}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charges: "},{"color":"green","text":"3"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charge Cooldown:"},{"color":"green","text":" 5s"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charge Regeneration: "},{"color":"green","text":"30s"}],"text":""}','{"extra":[{"text":""}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"bold":true,"color":"green","text":"UTILITY ITEM"}],"text":""}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"green","text":"Nothing Personal!"}],"text":""}'}}

{CustomModelData:707100,Damage:0,HideFlags:127,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gold","text":"Item Ability:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"gold","text":"Blazer"},{"bold":true,"color":"yellow","text":" RIGHT CLICK"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"Shoot a hitscan fire laser at your cursor."}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"If the laser hits a player:"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● They are affected with Glowing for 5 seconds"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● They are burnt for a small amount of time"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● A small explosion will be made"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"If the laser hits a block, it will explode for"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"a small amount of damage."}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charges: "},{"color":"green","text":"3"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charge Cooldown:"},{"color":"green","text":" 4s"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Charge Regeneration: "},{"color":"green","text":"15s"}],"text":""}','{"extra":[{"text":""}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"bold":true,"color":"green","text":"UTILITY ITEM"}],"text":""}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"green","text":"Blazer"}],"text":""}'}}

{CustomModelData:707100,Damage:0,HideFlags:127,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gold","text":"Item Ability:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"gold","text":"Brain of Confusion"},{"bold":true,"color":"yellow","text":" RIGHT CLICK"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"This ability only affects in a 20 block radius."}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"These effects are given to only you for 15 seconds"},{"text":":"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Swiftness 1"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":"These effects are given to every player for 15 seconds:"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Invisibility "}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Weakness 1"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Darkness"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"gray","text":" ● Nausea"}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"Cooldown:"},{"text":" "},{"color":"green","text":"90s"}],"text":""}','{"extra":[{"text":""}],"text":""}','{"italic":false,"color":"white","extra":[{"text":""},{"bold":true,"color":"green","text":"UTILITY ITEM"}],"text":""}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"extra":[{"text":""},{"color":"green","text":"Brain of Confusion"}],"text":""}'}}
